def_cn: 重新占领;重新夺回;收复
def_en: When soldiers recapture an area of land or a place, they gain control of it again from an opposing army who had taken it from them.

def_cn: （从竞争对手手中）重新夺回，重新拿回
def_en: When people recapture something that they have lost to a competitor, they get it back again.
To recapture a person or animal which has escaped from somewhere means to catch them again.

def_cn: （使）再次体验;（使）再次体会
def_en: When you recapture something such as an experience, emotion, or a quality that you had in the past, you experience it again. When something recaptures an experience for you, it makes you remember it.
